history.proof: intros H. apply In_perm in H. exists (l). shelve.

exceptions.tactic: apply Permutation_In_inv in H as [m1 [m2 H1]].

The reference m1 was not found in the current environment.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
x: X
l: list X

Goal:
In x l -> exists m : list X, l ~p x :: m

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
In_perm : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X), In x l -> exists m : list X, x :: m ~p l
Permutation_In_inv : forall l1 l2, l1 ~p l2 -> forall x : X, In x l1 -> exists l r : list X, l2 = l ++ x :: r
list_choose_dec : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall ll : list X, {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ P x /\ (forall y : X, In y l -> ~ P y)}}} + {forall x : X, In x ll -> ~ P x}
list_dec : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {Q x}) -> forall l : list X, {x : X | In x l /\ P x} + {forall x : X, In x l -> Q x}
list_first_dec : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall (a : X) (ll : list X), P a -> In a ll -> {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ P x /\ (forall y : X, In y l -> ~ P y)}}}
list_discrim : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {Q x}) -> forall l : list X, {lP : list X & {lQ : list X | l ~p lP ++ lQ /\ Forall P lP /\ Forall Q lQ}}
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type x : X l : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type x : X l : list X |- Type] ?f : [X : Type x : X l : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [X : Type x : X l : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [X : Type x : X l : list X |- list ?A]
incl_cons_rinv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l m : list X), incl m (x :: l) -> exists m1 m2 : list X, m ~p m1 ++ m2 /\ Forall (eq x) m1 /\ incl m2 l
incl_app_rinv : forall (X : Type) (l m p : list X), incl m (l ++ p) -> exists m1 m2 : list X, m ~p m1 ++ m2 /\ incl m1 l /\ incl m2 p
In_list_in_map_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X) (f : forall x : X, In x l -> Y) (y : Y), In y (list_in_map l f) -> exists (x : X) (Hx : In x l), y = f x Hx
list_in_map : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X), (forall x : X, In x l -> Y) -> list Y
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
incl_cons_linv : forall (X : Type) (l m : list X) (x : X), incl (x :: m) l -> In x l /\ incl m l
In_list_in_map : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X) (f : forall x : X, In x l -> Y) (x : X) (Hx : In x l), In (f x Hx) (list_in_map l f)
In_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> exists n : nat, nth_error l n = Some x
NoDup_Permutation : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> NoDup l' -> (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> l ~p l'
Permutation_in : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), l ~p l' -> In x l -> In x l'
Permutation_ind_transp : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l l) -> (forall (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), P (l1 ++ y :: x :: l2) (l1 ++ x :: y :: l2)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l1 l2 : list A, l1 ~p l2 -> P l1 l2
In_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x d : A), In x l -> exists n : nat, n < length l /\ nth n l d = x
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : nil ~p nil | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> x :: l ~p x :: l' | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), y :: x :: l ~p x :: y :: l | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> l' ~p l'' -> l ~p l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
perm_skip : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> x :: l ~p x :: l'
Permutation_ind_bis : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l')) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l'
Permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
Permutation_app : forall (A : Type) (l m l' m' : list A), l ~p l' -> m ~p m' -> l ++ m ~p l' ++ m'
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
incl_cons : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), In a m -> incl l m -> incl (a :: l) m
Permutation_vs_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l1 : list A) (a : A), l ~p a :: l1 -> exists l' l'' : list A, l = l' ++ a :: l''
Permutation_transp_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l l) -> (forall (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), P (l1 ++ y :: x :: l2) (l1 ++ x :: y :: l2)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation_transp l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation_transp l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation_transp l l0 -> P l l0
Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l' : list A, Add a l' l
Permutation_vs_elt_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), l ~p l1 ++ a :: l2 -> exists l' l'' : list A, l = l' ++ a :: l''
list_upper_bound : forall l : list nat, {m : nat | forall x : nat, In x l -> x < m}
NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l)
Permutation_cons_append : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), x :: l ~p l ++ x :: nil
ForallOrdPairs_In : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A), ForallOrdPairs R l -> forall x y : A, In x l -> In y l -> x = y \/ R x y \/ R y x
perm_swap : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (l : list A), y :: x :: l ~p x :: y :: l
In_In_t : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X) (P : Prop), (In_t x l -> P) -> In x l -> P
In_t : forall X : Type, X -> list X -> Type
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l

``` 
intros X x l H.
apply In_perm in H.
apply Permutation_In_inv in H as [m1 [m2 H1]].
exists (m1).
assumption.
```

original: intros X x l H. apply In_perm in H. apply Permutation_In_inv in H as [m1 [m2 H1]]. exists (m1). auto.
